entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is shocked and amazed by the phoenix's transformation.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A professor who enters the room and explains the nature of phoenixes to Harry.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Dumbledore's phoenix that bursts into flames and is reborn from its ashes.

relationships.description: Harry interacts with Dumbledore after the phoenix's transformation.
The phoenix's transformation affects Harry, causing him to be shocked and amazed.
